biotools.summary: VIP is a web portal for medical imaging applications. It allows users to access scientific applications as a service (directly through the web browser with no installation required), as well as distributed computing resources in a transparent manner. It exploits the resources available in the biomed virtual organization of the EGI e-infrastructure to offer an open service to researchers worldwide.

bioschemas.name: Virtual Imaging Platform
